channel.title: Cat2 on Michael Aguilar
channel.description: Recent content in Cat2 on Michael Aguilar

item.title: Building Reliable AI Systems Through Rigorous Process
item.description:
I recently built a production-ready application entirely with AI assistance - not as a proof-of-concept, but as a functional tool designed to solve complex workflow problems.

What makes it noteworthy for decision-makers:

Process over novelty: The system follows a structured ReAct framework (reasoning + action steps), requiring clear guardrails to ensure reliability.

Engineered for real use: 2,000+ lines of maintainable code, 99% test coverage, and built for extensibility across domains (e.g., swapping tools without rewriting core logic).

item.title: Generative AI Tutorial
item.description:
Who is this for?

Are you curious about how AI can enhance your work, but feel overwhelmed by the technical jargon? If so, youâ€™re in the right place!

When you last interacted with AI, did it seem like a mysterious magic box, or did you feel empowered to mold it to your needs?

In this primer, we’re going to remove the magic, and help you understand it as a tool you can manipulate.
